Norwich [UK], October 2 (ANI): A new study has found that children who eat a better diet, packed with fruit and vegetables, have better mental wellbeing.

articles.title: Cervical cancer: Early detection is the key to better disease management - The Indian Express
articles.description: Very few women are screened for cervical cancer despite India accounting for 16 per cent of total cervical cancer cases occurring globally, said Dr Rajeev Vijayakumar, Consultant, Medical Oncology, Haemato-oncology, BGS Gleneagles Global Hospitals, Bengaluru
